TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TextLoader/Context extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Context object by which a user can indicate what fields they want to read from a text file, and what data type they ought to have. Instances of this class are never made but the user, but rather are fed into the delegate in .

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.Scalar<bool> LoadBool (int ordinal);
.method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.Scalar`1<bool> LoadBool(int32 ordinal) cil managed
Public Function LoadBool (ordinal As Integer) As Scalar(Of Boolean)
member this.LoadBool : int -> Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.Scalar<bool>

Docs.param: The zero-based index of the field to read from.
Docs.summary: Reads a scalar Boolean column from a single field in the text file.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.Vector<bool> LoadBool (int minOrdinal, Nullable<int> maxOrdinal);
.method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.Vector`1<bool> LoadBool(int32 minOrdinal, valuetype System.Nullable`1<int32> maxOrdinal) cil managed
Public Function LoadBool (minOrdinal As Integer, maxOrdinal As Nullable(Of Integer)) As Vector(Of Boolean)
member this.LoadBool : int * Nullable<int> -> Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.Vector<bool>

Docs.param: The zero-based inclusive lower index of the field to read from.
The zero-based inclusive upper index of the field to read from. Note that if this is null, it will read to the end of the line. The file(s) will be inspected to get the length of the type.
Docs.summary: Reads a vector Boolean column from a range of fields in the text file.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.Key<uint> LoadKey (int ordinal, ulong minKeyValue, Nullable<ulong> maxKeyValue);

.method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.Key`1<unsigned int32> LoadKey(int32 ordinal, unsigned int64 minKeyValue, valuetype System.Nullable`1<unsigned int64> maxKeyValue) cil managed
Public Function LoadKey (ordinal As Integer, minKeyValue As ULong, maxKeyValue As Nullable(Of ULong)) As Key(Of UInteger)
member this.LoadKey : int * uint64 * Nullable<uint64> -> Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.Key<uint32>

Docs.param: The zero-based index of the field to read from.
smallest value of the loaded key values
If specified, it's the largest allowed value of the loaded key values. Use null if key is unbounded.
Docs.summary: Create a representation for a key loaded from TextLoader as an unsigned integer (32 bits).
